metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: C Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools C Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools C Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of C.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of C.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior experience with programming.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior experience with programming.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn C step by step, from the introduction to creating your first application with C.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn C step by step, from the introduction to creating your first application with C.

content.text: Get Started With C »
content.html: Get Started With C »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching C programming? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching C programming? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
C, like any other programming language, is best learned by working hands-on with code.
content.html: C, like any other programming language, is best learned by working hands-on with code.

content.text: Easily try code with our "Try it Yourself" editor.
content.html: Easily try code with our "Try it Yourself" editor.

content.text: Here, you can edit C code and view the result:
content.html: Here, you can edit C code and view the result:

content.code_html:
#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
  printf("Hello World!");
  return 0;
}

content.text: C Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The C exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools C syllabus.
content.html: The C exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools C syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified C Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified C Developer" Certification.

content.text: The exam is adaptive and graded, the students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The exam is adaptive and graded, the students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: The adaptive exam adjusts to your skill level. If you answer correctly, you get harder questions. If you answer incorrectly, you get easier questions. This to match the questions to your skill level.
content.html: The adaptive exam adjusts to your skill level. If you answer correctly, you get harder questions. If you answer incorrectly, you get easier questions. This to match the questions to your skill level.

content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach C programming?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach C programming?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
